/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/label-has-associated-control */ import { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { createCourse } from '../../store/actions/courseActions'; const CreateCourse = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [formCourse, setFormCourse] = useState(); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name } = e.target; const { value } = e.target; const newState = { ...formCourse }; newState[name] = value; setFormCourse(newState); }; const sendCourse = () => { dispatch(createCourse(formCourse)); }; return (
